ResearchProjectDef.label: Decoding Celestia technical language
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock Celestia tech items by decoding the symbols and words in Celestia tech to unlock the most basic equipment for the Rimworld environment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech technical interpretation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Decipher and research one of Celestia's unique technologies, Dust-Mech, a cybernetic-based programmable augmented nanomachine. Unlock the Dust-Mech emergency production method applicable to the Rimworld and unlock the actual standard Celestia technology.\n\n<color=#87cefa>"The Dust-Mech, known as the Adaptive Nano Calibration System, or ANCS, is a cybernetic-based augmented nanomachine developed by the Celestia civilisation. The Dust-Mech is capable of fusing different organisms with organisms, and organisms with machinery, and acts as a medium in which to acquire, transmit, and process information flows, and is highly adaptable when combined with intelligence. " - Parsed from Celestia's Self-explanatory Technology Core.</color>

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech reprogramming(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Dust-Mech reprogramming(WIP)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia clothing standards
ResearchProjectDef.description: Based on complex clothing,further parsing the clothing standards which fit Celestia's body type. Unlock complex clothing for Celestia, such as trench coats, summer vests, and more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia daily wear
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of a variety of daily clothing styles common to Celestia society, such as various uniforms and stockings. These garments must be made on the Celestia tailoring tab to begin with.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pioneer military uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the military clothing of the Celestia Pioneers, a uniform style that was once the uniform of the Celestia Marines and is now widely used in the Celestia Vanguard Squad.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia professional clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study Celestia's professional clothing, most of which was developed during The Navigator Programme to adapt to unknown planetary environments and was used in a variety of special scenarios.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia power assault armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocking the Celestia Power Assault Armour, based on the IEVA suits, combines a portion of the technology once used for the security forces of Celestia's Outer Rim domains to create a power assault armour that belongs to Celestia. \n\nThe standard power armour that was really used for Celestia's navy is difficult to make in the Rimworld, but this armour is also sufficient to face the intensity of conflict in the Rimworld.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Corona Borealis Programme(WIP)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Corona Borealis Programme(WIP)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech Call:Fibre Recombination
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of "Dust-Mech Silk", a high-strength fabric made using Dust-Mech to reorganise microscopic fibre structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia processing standard
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the "Celestia multifunctional tab", a special manufacturing station designed for Celestia's processing standard, used to manufacture various types of Celestia equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dust-Mech Call:Lattice Reconstruction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of "Chime Alloy", a special alloy made by using Dust-Mech to reconfigure the lattice structure of metals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic specialised alloy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock "Blackstone Alloy" and "Warlock Alloy", two alloys with special properties for psychic energy reactions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia pioneer weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Follow Celestia's standard to design pioneer weapons, allow for the creation of pioneer ice axes and the modification of simple firearms. \n\nThese designs are said to have originated from antique artefacts brought by the original Celestia from its home planet, but no one has been able to confirm or disprove this.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Celestia classical weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Classical weapons designed to Celestia's weapon specifications and ammunition calibres allowed for the crafting of weapons such as the Pathfinder Sabre and improved precision rifles. \n\nThese classical weapons are still used in Celestia Pathfinder pioneer squads or are issued to outpost residents for self-defence; their history can no longer be traced.

ResearchProjectDef.label: celestia late weapon permission
ResearchProjectDef.description: celestia late weapon production permission, authorised by celestia government.

ResearchProjectDef.label: celestia experimental weapon permission
ResearchProjectDef.description: celestia experimental weapon production permission, authorised by celestia government.

ResearchProjectDef.description: celestia elementary biochemical products production permission, authorised by celestia central research institute.

ResearchProjectDef.description: celestia middel biochemical products production permission, authorised by celestia central research institute.
